casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 18, 2014

[Cite as 02/18/2014 Case Announcements #2, 2014-Ohio-571.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2014-0255. State v. Shorter.

Mahoning App. No. 12 MA 55. This cause is pending before the court as a jurisdictional appeal. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for immediate stay of the court of appeals’ judgment, it is ordered by the court that appellee shall file a response, if any, to the motion for immediate stay no later than 12:00 p.m. on Friday, February 21, 2014.
